<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/70440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>70440</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120525</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120525</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Seštevanje polj</string>
            <string language="en">Adding Fields</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Hinzufügen Fängt auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ajouter des Zones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Adicionando Campos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aggiunta Dei Campi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσθήκη των πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Adición De Campos</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje naelektrene krogle v polkrožni posodi pod vplivom gravitacije in električnega polja.</string>
            <string language="en">The motion of charged sphere in a bowl under the influence of gravity and electric field.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električno polje</string>
            <string language="en">electric field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">gravitacijsko polje</string>
            <string language="en">gravity field</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bewegung des belasteten Bereichs in einer 
Schüssel unter dem Einfluß von Schwerkraft und die elektrischen 
fangen auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement de la sphère chargée dans une 
cuvette sous l'influence de la pesanteur et du champ électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento da esfera carregada em uma bacia sob a
influência da gravidade e do campo elétrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento della sfera caricata in una ciotola 
sotto l'influenza di gravità e del campo elettrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κίνηση της χρεωμένης σφαίρας σε ένα κύπελλο κάτω 
από την επιρροή της βαρύτητας και του ηλεκτρικού πεδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento de la esfera cargada en un tazón de
fuente bajo influencia de la gravedad y del campo eléctrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwerkraft fangen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">zone de pesanteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo elétrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo da gravidade</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo elettrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo di gravità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πεδίο βαρύτητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo eléctrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo de la gravedad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
